description: Check that sdk.actions.ready() is called in code
script:
#!/bin/bash
echo 'üîç Checking for sdk.actions.ready() call...'

if echo "$TOOL_CALL_ARGS" | grep -q 'useEffect\|componentDidMount'; then
  if echo "$TOOL_CALL_ARGS" | grep -q 'sdk\.actions\.ready'; then
    echo '‚úÖ sdk.actions.ready() found'
  else
    echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Warning: useEffect/componentDidMount found but no sdk.actions.ready() call'
    echo '   This may cause infinite loading screen!'
  fi
fi
